news.title: Food prices continue to surge as inflation remains at 3.8%
news.summary: While UK inflation held steady in August, the pace of price rises for food surged, increasing cost of living pressures.

news.title: Ex-Labour councillor charged in Westminster 'honeytrap' case
news.summary: The charges relate to alleged WhatsApp messages sent to people within Westminster circles.

news.title: New Â£22bn AI deal could rapidly boost UK economy, says Microsoft boss
news.summary: Boss Satya Nadella said it was the biggest investment the firm had made outside of the US.

news.title: JLR supply chain staff told to apply for universal credit, union claims
news.summary: Staff are being laid off with "reduced or zero pay" following a cyber attack, which has forced the carmaker to shut down, Unite union claims.

news.title: Thousands of Palestinians flee as Israeli troops push into Gaza City
news.summary: Israel says its aim is to defeat up to 3,000 Hamas fighters who remain there, but the offensive has drawn international condemnation.

news.title: Charlie Kirk suspect confessed in hidden note to roommate, prosecutors allege
news.summary: The 22-year-old has been charged with murder and is facing the death penalty if convicted at trial.

news.title: Four arrests after Trump and Epstein images projected on Windsor Castle
news.summary: Police said four people remain in custody after the "stunt," which coincided with the US president's arrival in the UK.

news.title: What is the President doing on his visit to the UK?
news.summary: US President Donald Trump and his wife Melania are in the UK for an unprecedented second state visit.

news.title: The Summer I Turned Pretty reaches emotional climax
news.summary: Spoiler warning: The much-anticipated final episode reveals how the talked-about TV show's plot ends.

news.title: Ex-Arsenal star Thomas Partey denies rape charges
news.summary: The 32-year-old footballer was in court accused of raping two women and sexually assaulting another.
